tool.name: Paffy shatter
tool.description: breaks up PAF alignments into individual matches
tool.command: #if $input_paf.ext.endswith('.gz') gunzip -c '$input_paf' | #end if paffy shatter --logLevel 'INFO' --outputFile '$out_file' #if not $input_paf.ext.endswith('.gz') --inputFile '$input_paf' #end if
tool.help: Paffy shatter breaks each alignment in a PAF file into smaller, gapless subalignments, producing one record per contiguous matching segment. As output, a new PAF file is generated with the shattered alignments.
